description: Can you enter the code to deactivate the volcano before it erupts?

puzzles.description: Make Dash wait for 1.0 s then turn the lights off.
puzzles.introduction: At first the volcano looks calm and silent...

hints.description: Link the states with a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.

puzzles.description: Make Dash wait for a random time up to 5.0 s then turn on red lights.

hints.description: Link the states with a Random Wait cue set to 5.0 s. The Random Wait cue will make Dash wait a random number of seconds between zero and the number you choose.

puzzles.description: After the red light, make Dash automatically play the sound of an erupting volcano. Use a custom sound to record your own voice making the sound of an erupting volcano.
puzzles.introduction: What does an erupting volcano sound like?

hints.description: Link the Red light to the Custom Sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the erupting volcano sound, make Dash return to Start when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: Lucky for us, when Dash erupts, we can press the top button make Dash calm again!

hints.description: Link the states with a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After the lights are off, make Dash turn on orange lights when button 3 is pressed. Then make Dash wait for 1.0 s before turning the lights off again.
puzzles.introduction: When the volcano is calm, pressing button 3 looks like a good way to avoid disaster, at least for a few s.

hints.description: Link the states with a Button 3 Pressed cue and a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.

puzzles.description: After the orange lights, make Dash turn on yellow lights when button 2 is pressed. Then make Dash wait for 1.0 s before turning the lights off again.
puzzles.introduction: We're getting there! Push button 2 quickly or else Dash goes back to the random countdown.

hints.description: Link the Yellow light with a Button 2 Pressed cue and a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.

puzzles.description: After the yellow lights, make Dash turn on green lights when button 1 is pressed. Then make Dash automatically play the "Tah dah!" sound.
puzzles.introduction: If you press buttons 3, 2, and 1 fast enough, you've saved the day!

hints.description: Link the Green light with a Button 1 Pressed cue. Link the sound with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the "Tah dah!" sound, make Dash turn the lights off again when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction:
You saved the day!  
But you never know when the volcano will erupt again...

hints.description: Link the states with a Top Button Pressed cue.
